column4: hi, everyone, i have a strange problem with ubuntu jaunty, i am trying to run a postgresql-8.3-server and whenever i use /etc/init.d/postgresql-8.3 start absolutely nothing happens and no server is started
i am used to using complete
ok, so you need to do some post install things
that has never happened to me under debian
sudo apt-get install postgresql postgresql-client postgresql-contrib
after that, do this: sudo su postgres -c psql template1
well i don't have it on machine that i'm sitting right now ;)
i only have one and that isn't in /usr/bin/
